mapper.select: SELECT userId, m.memberIdx, lastName, firstName, userPwd, status, createDate, lastLogin FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN memberInfo i ON m.MEMBERIDX = i.MEMBERIDX WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT userId, m.memberIdx, lastName, firstName, ZIPCODE, ADDR1, ADDR2, TO_CHAR(BIRTH,'YYYY-MM-DD') BIRTH, TEL FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN memberInfo i ON m.MEMBERIDX = i.MEMBERIDX WHERE m.memberIdx = #{memberIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET lastLogin = SYSDATE WHERE userId = #{userId}
UPDATE member SET enabled=#{enabled} WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT userId, authority FROM memberAuthority WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE memberAuthority SET authority=#{authority} WHERE userId=#{userId} AND authority=#{oldAuthority}
